data.name: Bendigo Reward Saver
data.description: A savings account that helps you save for your goals - with a Bonus Rate to get you there faster.

features.additionalInfo: Bonus interest rate available when you hold an eligible transaction account with us and grow your balance each month.
Larger bonus rate available to customers 30 years old or younger, subject to meeting eligibility criteria.

features.additionalValue: Ability for existing customers to open an account in e-banking

eligibility.additionalInfo: Must hold an eligible transaction account with Bendigo Bank to receive the Bonus rate
Must grow balance over the month to receive the Bonus rate
A larger Bonus Rate is available to customers 30 years old or younger, subject to the other criteria being met.

depositRates.additionalInfo: Bonus Rate in addition to variable (Base) rate where criteria is met
depositRates.additionalValue: For customers 31 years old or older Subject to eligibility criteria being met

depositRates.additionalInfo: Bonus Rate in addition to variable (Base) rate where criteria is met.
depositRates.additionalValue: For customers 30 years old or younger, subject to eligibility criteria being met
